meanings.definition: Ankylosaurus: a heavily armored dinosaur with a bony club at the end of its tail.
meanings.sent1: The ankylosaurus had thick, tough skin to protect itself.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the ankylosaurus fossils to learn about its lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The ankylosaurus tried to play hide-and-seek, but its tail gave it away every time.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of challenges, she was like an ankylosaurus, armored against any criticism.
meanings.sent5: The ankylosaurus's tail club was like a powerful weapon in battle.

meanings.definition: Ankylosaurus: a genus of herbivorous dinosaurs that lived during the Late Cretaceous period.
meanings.sent1: The ankylosaurus genus included various species with unique features.
meanings.sent2: Paleontologists have discovered new information about the ankylosaurus genus.
meanings.sent3: At the dinosaur party, the ankylosaurus was the herbivore in charge of the salad bar.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening made her feel like an ankylosaurus, nurturing her plants with care.
meanings.sent5: The ankylosaurus genus roamed the earth millions of years ago, leaving a mark in history.
